about_the_game:
Early Access Disclaimer:

Welcome Survivors,
we started Frozen Below a while ago and want to use Early Access to make the best out of it. For that purpose the first launch will feature only the prologue with roughly 1 hour of gameplay and plan to release further progression over time while including changes and updates based on feedback.

So we invite everyone to discuss and build a truly enjoyable horror escape game with us.

About:

Dive into the heart of the Arctic, where the relentless cold is only the beginning of your nightmares. Frozen Below is a first-person survival horror experience that takes you through the frozen wastelands and into the depths of hidden, icy caverns. You are a researcher stranded after an unexpected accident cuts off your team's communications and your only way home. But the Arctic is not as empty as it seems...

As you explore the barren, snow-covered landscape, you’ll uncover traces of an ancient and horrifying secret buried deep within the ice. Mysterious creatures lurk in the shadows, stalking you at every turn. Your only goal is to survive, unravel the truth, and escape this frozen hell.

Features:

  • Explore the Arctic: Roam the eerie, frozen surface and delve into labyrinthine ice caves. Each location is more sinister than the last, and every step brings you closer to the horrifying truth that lies buried in the ice.

  • Survival Horror: Limited resources mean you must manage supplies carefully. Every flare, every flashlight battery, and every moment counts when you're up against the unknown.

  • Stealth and Strategy: The creatures in the caves are sensitive to sound and light. Use the darkness to your advantage, but beware—something might be watching you from the shadows.

  • Dynamic Environment: The Arctic landscape is constantly shifting. Collapsing ice, blizzards, and disorienting darkness make each venture into the caves a life-or-death decision.

  • Puzzle Solving: Decipher ancient runes, navigate through treacherous cave systems, and solve environmental puzzles to unlock new areas. Only by piecing together clues can you find the path to escape.

  • Immersive Sound Design: Every howl of the wind, crunch of the snow, and distant growl will leave you questioning what lurks beyond the next corner.

Can you survive the relentless cold, the ever-present danger, and the chilling secrets that lie beneath the ice? Prepare yourself for Frozen Below, your escape from the Arctic won’t be easy.

With realistic graphics, immersive sound design, and a gripping storyline, "Frozen Below: Arctic Expedition" will keep you on the edge of your seat as you journey into the abyss of the Arctic cave. Can you survive the frozen terror that awaits you in the depths of the cave and uncover the truth before it's too late? Get ready to face your fears and embark on a chilling adventure unlike any other on Steam.

content_descriptors.notes: This game is made to make you feel uncomfortable and contains maybe scary scenes and psychological game mechanics like scare jumps.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 with DirectX 12
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2050 / AMD RX 6000 / Intel® Arc™ A550 Graphics Card

short_description: "Frozen Below: Arctic Expedition" is a horror exploration game. Explore an Arctic cave, uncover secrets, and escape a lurking presence. With realistic graphics and immersive sound design, can you survive the frozen terror and escape the darkness?
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
